---
title: "Specials"
theme: 
  - Lux
type: default 
---

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| results: asis
base_dir <- "."

sub_dirs <- list.dirs(base_dir, recursive = FALSE, full.names = FALSE)
sub_dirs <- sub_dirs[!grepl("^\\.", sub_dirs)]
sub_dirs <- sub_dirs[sub_dirs != "index_files"]
sub_dirs <- sort(sub_dirs)

links <- vapply(sub_dirs, function(name) {
  docs <- file.path(base_dir, name, "Docs")
  if (!dir.exists(docs)) return(NA_character_)
  html <- list.files(docs, pattern = "\\.html$", full.names = FALSE)
  if (length(html) == 0) return(NA_character_)
  html <- sort(html)[1]

  path <- file.path(name, "docs", html)
  path <- gsub("\\\\", "/", path)
  url <- utils::URLencode(path)
  sprintf("- [%s](%s)", name, url)
}, character(1))

links <- links[!is.na(links)]
cat(paste(links, collapse = "\n"), "\n")
```
